jobInfo.Jobdescription:
InfoDrive Solutions, Singapore is currently seeking a highly skilled SAP Treasury and Risk Management (TRM) Consultant with a minimum of 5 years of dedicated experience in SAP TRM. This role requires a deep understanding of SAP TRM modules and the ability to effectively implement and configure them.

Job Description:

Responsibilities:

  1. Configuration of Transaction Manager: Proficiently configure Money Market, Forex, Derivatives, and Securities modules within the SAP TRM system.
  2. Market Data Management: Manage FX Rates and Reference Interest Rates competently within SAP TRM.
  3. Credit Risk Analyser: Possess expertise in Limit Management and credit risk analysis within the SAP TRM context.
  4. Functional Specifications: Skill fully draft comprehensive functional specifications for various SAP TRM processes and functionalities.
  5. Master Data Management: Demonstrate proficiency in handling Business Partner Master Data within SAP TRM.
  6. End-to-End Business Processes: Display extensive hands-on experience in SAP Treasury End-to-End Business Processes, covering Front Office, Back Office, and Accounting functionalities.
  7. Communication Skills: Communicate effectively with stakeholders and team members to ensure smooth collaboration and project success.

Qualifications and Skills:

  • Minimum of 5+ years of dedicated experience in SAP Treasury and Risk Management (TRM) with a strong focus on hands-on configuration and implementation.
  • In exceptional cases, candidates with less than 5 years of experience will be considered, subject to interview outcomes.
  • Thorough understanding of Money Market, Forex, Derivatives, and Securities modules in SAP TRM.
  • Familiarity with Market Data Management, including FX Rates and Reference Interest Rates.
  • Proven experience with Credit Risk Analyser and Limit Management in SAP TRM.
  • Proficient in writing Functional Specifications for SAP TRM processes.
  • Knowledgeable in Business Partner Master Data management within SAP TRM.
  • Strong grasp of SAP Treasury End-to-End Business Processes, encompassing Front Office, Back Office, and Accounting.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

If you are an experienced SAP TRM professional seeking new challenges in a dynamic and innovative environment, we invite you to apply. Please submit your updated resume along with a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and immediate availability. We eagerly anticipate the opportunity to discuss how you can contribute to our esteemed team at InfoDrive Solutions.
